title: Rider Crashes 25 Meters Down Ravine, Climbs Out, and Doesn’t Come Last in Giro d’Italia ‘Queen Stage’
content:
'I came to a stop around a tree ... I was at least 25-30 meters deep in a ravine': Jenthe Biermans saw another side of the Mortirolo on Sunday at the Giro d'Italia.

Read the full article at Rider Crashes 25 Meters Down Ravine, Climbs Out, and Doesn’t Come Last in Giro d’Italia ‘Queen Stage’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
